channel.title: Gnome on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Gnome on Dan Aukes

item.title: Post-Install Miscellaneous Steps
item.description: Install gnome tweaks sudo apt install gnome-tweaks Tweaking the GUI Open “Extensions” and turn off desktop icons Update firefox settings flatpak firefox settings found in ~/.

item.title: Multiple Clocks in Ubuntu / Gnome
item.description: sudo apt install -y gnome-clocks flatpak install -y com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager flatpak run com.
